attributes.action: Make Covid-19 tests freely available to all international travellers at airports
attributes.additional_details:
1. Covid-19 tests are very expensive.
2. The Government has not capped the price of tests.
3. The cost of tests is not proportional to earnings.
attributes.background: The Government should reform current arrangements for Covid-19 testing for international travellers, and make tests freely available in airports before departure to the UK, and on arrival. Results should be available immediately, in a digital format in the language requested.
